column6: Venom exists as one of Spider-Man's deadliest and darkest enemies. See how an embittered, washed-up journalist became one of the greatest threats to the lives of Peter Parker and his loved ones!
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | other:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Scott Hanna | penciller:Angel Medina | colorist:Matt Milla | writer:Zeb Wells
